remarks: Transfer ordered-pair existence from/to single variable existence. (Contributed by NM, 26-Feb-2014.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
statement:
exopxfr.1 $e |- ( x = <. y , z >. -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
exopxfr $p |- ( E. x e. ( _V X. _V ) ph <-> E. y E. z ps ) $.
$d ph y z $.
$d ps x $.
